title: "Invalid username/password combination"
body: Does anyone counter this issue like me. I tried to log in to the client but it keeps saying "invalid username/password combination. Please try again" . Even though I have tried to change my password and can even log into the board, but the client doesn't let me log in.

replies.body:
Hey there,

It's possible you have the wrong region selected in the launcher.

Ensure you're client is currently patched to OCE, this can be checked by running the launcher and looking in the top right (Image below)

http://puu.sh/obGKi/5638ad76eb.png
